tool.name: ListUsers
tool.summary: This tool provides some basic functionality for retrieving a list of users from the Workflow Manager database. Currently, it can retrieve all users, or the users who are in a specific group.
tool.usage:
• The default Workflow Manager database must be set before running this tool.

  • The user running this tool must have administrative access to the Workflow Manager database.

param.name: in_string_groupName
param.displayname: Name of group to list (blank lists all users)
param.dialogReference:
If this parameter is specified, the only users listed will be the members of the specified group.

The domain for this parameter is based on the Workflow Manager groups present in the database.
param.pythonReference:
If this parameter is specified, the only users listed will be the members of the specified group.

The domain for this parameter is based on the Workflow Manager groups present in the database.

param.name: out_mvString_userList
param.dialogReference: The usernames for those users meeting the specified criteria. The parameter itself is a multi-value output of strings.
param.pythonReference: The usernames for those users meeting the specified criteria. The parameter itself is a multi-value output of strings.

param.name: in_string_wmxDatabaseAlias
param.dialogReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.
param.pythonReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool provides some basic functionality for retrieving a list of users from the Workflow Manager database. Currently, it can retrieve all users, or the users who are in a specific group.
